name: Black Rainbow
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: 8, 7, Vista, XP Процессор: 1.6 GHz Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 256 MB DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 500 MB

reviews.review_text: Fun adventure game, with new puzzles and 21 hidden skulls to find during your adventure. Three modes of adventure. Good story line, a couple of achievements to get, but not overwhelming. I recommend this game.
